item.title: Questions, takeaways from Thanksgiving matchups: Our reporters break down every game
item.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer big questions from each Week 13 game, starting with Thanksgiving Day matchups.

item.title: Dak Prescott matched Patrick Mahomes' magic in dramatic win over Chiefs
item.description: Prescott rebounded from an early INT to push the Cowboys back into playoff contention.

item.description: What is the 76ers' ceiling? How good is the Maxey-Edgecombe duo? We talked to league insiders about the new era in Philly.

item.title: How Tyrese Maxey went from the hardwood to the 2025 National Dog Show
item.description: Maxey recently ran two dogs through the Purina Pro Plan Incredible Dog Challenge Agility Show in Philadelphia.
